titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C09

body.ab:
<lb n="c56-0031__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0031.07" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 5<lb n="c56-0031__main__2"/> From this day natural philosophy and parti<lb n="c56-0031__main__3"/>cularly chemistry became <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nearly my sole <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5359__Start"/>appli<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5359__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__main__4"/> study. I read with ardour <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5364__Start"/>m<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5364__End"/> those books <lb n="c56-0031__main__5"/> so full of genius and discrimination <lb n="c56-0031__main__6"/><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5373__Start"/>at have been written<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5373__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/> which modern <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/> enquirers on these sub<lb n="c56-0031__main__7"/>jects. I attended the lectures, and culti<lb n="c56-0031__main__8"/>vated the acquaintance of the men <lb n="c56-0031__main__9"/> of science of the university; and I found <lb n="c56-0031__main__10"/> even in Mr Krempe a great deal <lb n="c56-0031__main__11"/> of sound sense & real information <lb n="c56-0031__main__12"/> combined it is true with a repulsive <lb n="c56-0031__main__13"/> phisiognomy & manners, but not on <lb n="c56-0031__main__14"/> that account the less valuable. <lb n="c56-0031__main__15"/> In M. Waldman I found a true friend. <lb n="c56-0031__main__16"/> His gentleness was never tinged by <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5421__Start"/>dg<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5421__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__main__17"/> dogmatism and his instructions were <lb n="c56-0031__main__18"/> given with an air of frankness and <lb n="c56-0031__main__19"/> good nature that banished every idea <lb n="c56-0031__main__20"/> of <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5436__Start"/>pedantl<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5436__End"/> pedantry. It was perhaps the <lb n="c56-0031__main__21"/> amiable character of this man that <lb n="c56-0031__main__22"/> enclined me more to the study of that <lb n="c56-0031__main__23"/> branch of <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5448__Start"/>science<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5448__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>natural philosophy which he professed than an intrinsic <lb n="c56-0031__main__24"/> love for the science itself. But this <lb n="c56-0031__main__25"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0031.03">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/><del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5474__Start"/>circumstance<del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5474__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__3"/><del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5479__Start"/>was had<del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5479__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__4"/>
state of mind had <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__5"/> place <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5491__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5491__End"/> only in the first steps towards the <lb n="c56-0031__main__26"/> knowledge; the more fully I entered <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5502__Start"/>more fully<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5502__End"/> into <lb n="c56-0031__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5508__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5508__End"/><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5511__Start"/>philosophy<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5511__End"/>science the more I <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5521__Start"/>studied<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5521__End"/> pursued it <lb n="c56-0031__main__28"/> for its own sake. That application <lb n="c56-0031__main__29"/> which at first had been a matter <lb n="c56-0031__main__30"/> of <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5534__Start"/>ch<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5534__End"/> duty <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& resolution, now became so ardent <lb n="c56-0031__main__31"/> and eager that the stars often <lb n="c56-0031__main__32"/> dissapeared <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/> in the light of <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/> morning while I was yet <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5566__Start"/>labouring<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5566__End"/>engaged<lb n="c56-0031__main__33"/> in my labrotary.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0032__main__1"/> As I applied so closely, it may be <lb n="c56-0032__main__2"/> easily conceived that I improved rapid<lb n="c56-0032__main__3"/>ly. <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5592__Start"/>It<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5592__End"/> My ardour was indeed the astonish<lb n="c56-0032__main__4"/>ment of the students, and my proficiency <lb n="c56-0032__main__5"/> that of the master. <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5603__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5603__End"/> Professor Krempe <lb n="c56-0032__main__6"/> often asked me with a sly smile <lb n="c56-0032__main__7"/> how Cornelius Agrippa went on;<metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/> while M. Waldham <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__2"/> expressed the most <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__3"/> heartfelt exultation <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__4"/> in my progress. Two <lb n="c56-0032__main__8"/> years passed in this manner during <lb n="c56-0032__main__9"/> which I paid no visit to Geneva, but <lb n="c56-0032__main__10"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5641__Start"/>ws<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5641__End"/> was engaged heart and soul in the <lb n="c56-0032__main__11"/> pursuit of some discoveries which I <lb n="c56-0032__main__12"/> hoped to make. <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5648__Start"/>No one<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5648__End"/> None but those <lb n="c56-0032__main__13"/> who have experienced it can conceive <lb n="c56-0032__main__14"/> of the enticements of science–<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5656__Start"/>especially<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5656__End"/> In <lb n="c56-0032__main__15"/> other studies you go as far as others have <lb n="c56-0032__main__16"/>gone before you and there is nothing <lb n="c56-0032__main__17"/> more to <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5672__Start"/>learn<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5672__End"/>know, learn, but in a scientific <lb n="c56-0032__main__18"/> pursuit <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5682__Start"/>their<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5682__End"/> there is continual <lb n="c56-0032__main__19"/> food for discovery and wonder. A mind <lb n="c56-0032__main__20"/> of <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5689__Start"/>even<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5689__End"/> moderate capacity who closely pursues <lb n="c56-0032__main__21"/> one study must infallibly arrive at <lb n="c56-0032__main__22"/> great proficiency in that study—And I <lb n="c56-0032__main__23"/> who <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5705__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5705__End"/> continually <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5710__Start"/>applied to<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5710__End"/>sought the attainment of one <lb n="c56-0032__main__24"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5721__Start"/>thing<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5721__End"/>object <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/>pursuit and was wrapt up <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5743__Start"/>as I was<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5743__End"/> in this sole<lb n="c56-0032__main__25"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5751__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5751__End"/> improved so rapidly that at the end <lb n="c56-0032__main__26"/> of the two years I made <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5756__Start"/>one or two<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5756__End"/>some<lb n="c56-0032__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5763__Start"/>trifling<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5763__End"/> discoveries in the improvement <lb n="c56-0032__main__28"/> of some chemical <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5772__Start"/>machines<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5772__End"/>instruments which pro<lb n="c56-0032__main__29"/>cured me great esteem and admiration <lb n="c56-0032__main__30"/> at the university. When I arrived at <lb n="c56-0032__main__31"/> this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>point, <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/> and had learned <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__2"/> all the professors <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__3"/> at Ingolstadt were <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__4"/> qualified to teach<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5812__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5812__End"/> my residence <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5821__Start"/>at In<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5821__End"/><lb n="c56-0033__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5831__Start"/>golstadt was<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5831__End"/><lb n="c56-0033__left_margin__1"/>there being no longer conducive to <lb n="c56-0033__main__2"/> my improvement, I thought of returning <lb n="c56-0033__main__3"/> to my friends and to my native town, <lb n="c56-0033__main__4"/> when an incident happened that <lb n="c56-0033__main__5"/> protracted my stay.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0033__main__6"/> One of those phænonoma which <lb n="c56-0033__main__7"/> had <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5859__Start"/>most<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5859__End"/> peculiarly attracted my atten<lb n="c56-0033__main__8"/>tion was the structure of the human <lb n="c56-0033__main__9"/> frame; and indeed that of any animal <lb n="c56-0033__main__10"/> endued with life. Whence I often asked <lb n="c56-0033__main__11"/> myself did this principle of life proceed. <lb n="c56-0033__main__12"/> It was a bold question, and one <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5883__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5883__End"/><lb n="c56-0033__left_margin__1"/>which<lb n="c56-0033__main__13"/> has ever been considered as a mystery. <lb n="c56-0033__main__14"/> Yet how many things are we on the <lb n="c56-0033__main__15"/> brink of becoming acquainted with <lb n="c56-0033__main__16"/> if cowardice or carelessness did <lb n="c56-0033__main__17"/> not restrain our enquiries?. I revolved these circum<lb n="c56-0033__main__18"/>stances in my mind and determined <lb n="c56-0033__main__19"/> from thenceforth to apply myself more <lb n="c56-0033__main__20"/> particularly to those branches of natural <lb n="c56-0033__main__21"/> philosophy which <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5935__Start"/>treats<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5935__End"/>relate to phisiology. <lb n="c56-0033__main__22"/> Unless I had been animated by an al<lb n="c56-0033__main__23"/>most supernatural enthusiasm, my <lb n="c56-0033__main__24"/> application to this study would have <lb n="c56-0033__main__25"/> been irksome and almost intolerable. <lb n="c56-0033__main__26"/> To examine the causes of life <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5957__Start"/>de<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5957__End"/> we must <lb n="c56-0033__main__27"/> first have <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5964__Start"/>recou<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5964__End"/> recourse to death. <lb n="c56-0033__main__28"/><del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5968__Start"/>No is ano anatomy<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5968__End"/> I became acquainted <lb n="c56-0033__main__29"/> with the science of anatomy but this <lb n="c56-0033__main__30"/> was not sufficient. I must also observe <lb n="c56-0033__main__31"/> the natural decay & corruption of the <lb n="c56-0033__main__32"/> human body. In my education<lb n="c56-0034__main__1"/> my father had taken the greatest <lb n="c56-0034__main__2"/> precautions that my mind should <lb n="c56-0034__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e5991__Start"/>not<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e5991__End"/> be impressed by ^no supernatural <lb n="c56-0034__main__4"/> horrors. I do not ever remember <lb n="c56-0034__main__5"/> having trembled at <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6010__Start"/>a ghost story<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6010__End"/>tale of superstition or <lb n="c56-0034__main__6"/> to have feared the apparition of a spirit <lb n="c56-0034__main__7"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6023__Start"/>Ligh<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6023__End"/> Darkness had no effect upon my <lb n="c56-0034__main__8"/> fancy and a churchyard was to <lb n="c56-0034__main__9"/> me merely ^as the receptacle of <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6040__Start"/>rotten b<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6040__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__main__10"/> bodies deprived of life and <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6047__Start"/>becoming<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6047__End"/>which<lb n="c56-0034__main__11"/> from being the seat of beauty &<lb n="c56-0034__main__12"/> strength ^become food for the worm. <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6068__Start"/>But<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6068__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__main__13"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6072__Start"/>I <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6072__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6076__Start"/>A loathsome<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6076__End"/>c<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6082__Start"/>But<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6082__End"/> now I was <lb n="c56-0034__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6088__Start"/>obliged<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6088__End"/>led to examine the <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6097__Start"/>cause<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6097__End"/>cause& progress <lb n="c56-0034__main__15"/> of this decay and forced to spend days <lb n="c56-0034__main__16"/> and nights in vaults and Charnel <lb n="c56-0034__main__17"/> houses. I <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6114__Start"/>was obliged<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6114__End"/> My attention was <lb n="c56-0034__main__18"/> fixed upon every <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6122__Start"/>horror of whic<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6122__End"/>object <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6127__Start"/>calculated to<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6127__End"/>the most insupportable to the delicacy of<lb n="c56-0034__main__19"/> the human feelings. <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6136__Start"/>are suscept<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6136__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6138__Start"/>able<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6138__End"/>– <lb n="c56-0034__main__20"/> I saw how the fine form of <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6143__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6143__End"/> man <lb n="c56-0034__main__21"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6150__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6150__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6153__Start"/>became<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6153__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__1"/>was degraded and wasted. I beheld the <lb n="c56-0034__main__22"/> corruption of death succeed to the bloom<lb n="c56-0034__main__23"/>ing cheek of life – I saw how the wormsuc<lb n="c56-0034__main__24"/>ceeded toinherited the wonders of the eye and <lb n="c56-0034__main__25"/> brain. I paused, examining and anal<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6197__Start"/>yzed<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6197__End"/>yzing<lb n="c56-0034__main__26"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6205__Start"/>every<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6205__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6208__Start"/>minutiæ<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6208__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6211__Start"/> of <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6211__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6214__Start"/>causation<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6214__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__1"/> all the minutiæ <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__2"/> of causation <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__3"/> as exemplified in <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__4"/> the change from <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__5"/> life to death, &<lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__6"/> death to life, untill <lb n="c56-0034__main__27"/> from the midst of this darkness <lb n="c56-0034__main__28"/> a sudden light broke in upon me. <lb n="c56-0034__main__29"/> A light so brilliant & wondrous yet<lb n="c56-0035__main__1"/> so simple that while it intoxica<lb n="c56-0035__main__2"/>ted me<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__1"/> I became dizzy <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__2"/> with the immen<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__3"/>sity of the prospect <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__4"/> which it illus<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__5"/>trated, I was surprised that I <lb n="c56-0035__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6288__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6288__End"/> among so many men of genius <lb n="c56-0035__main__4"/> who had applied to the same science <lb n="c56-0035__main__5"/> that I alone should discover <lb n="c56-0035__main__6"/> this astonishing secret.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0035__main__7"/> Remember I am <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>not recording the <lb n="c56-0035__main__8"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6313__Start"/>no<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6313__End"/> vision <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6317__Start"/>of<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6317__End"/> of a madman – the <lb n="c56-0035__main__9"/> sun does not more certainly shine <lb n="c56-0035__main__10"/> in the heavens than that which<lb n="c56-0035__main__11"/> I now <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6332__Start"/>record<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6332__End"/>affirm, is true. Some miracle <lb n="c56-0035__main__12"/> might have produced it. But the <lb n="c56-0035__main__13"/> stages of discovery were distinct <lb n="c56-0035__main__14"/> and probable. After days and nights <lb n="c56-0035__main__15"/> of incredible <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6350__Start"/>toil<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6350__End"/>labour and fatigue <lb n="c56-0035__main__16"/> I succeeded in discovering the <lb n="c56-0035__main__17"/> cause of generation & life. Nay <lb n="c56-0035__main__18"/> more, I <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6366__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6366__End"/>became myself capable of <lb n="c56-0035__main__19"/> bestowing animation upon lifeless <lb n="c56-0035__main__20"/> matter.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0035__main__21"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6381__Start"/>My<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6381__End"/> The surprise <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6386__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6386__End"/>which I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>at firstexperienced <lb n="c56-0035__main__22"/> on this discovery soon gave place to <lb n="c56-0035__main__23"/> delight and rapture. After such <lb n="c56-0035__main__24"/> painful labour<metamark function="insert" xml:id="c56-0035.06">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__1"/> After so much <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__2"/><metamark function="displacement">^</metamark>time spent in <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__3"/> painful labour<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6433__Start"/>come<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6433__End"/>to arrive at onece <lb n="c56-0035__main__25"/> at the <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6445__Start"/>obj ect<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6445__End"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6448__Start"/>object<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6448__End"/>summit of my desires <lb n="c56-0035__main__26"/> was the most gratifying circumstance <lb n="c56-0035__main__27"/> that could have occurred. But this <lb n="c56-0035__main__28"/> discovery was so great and overwhelm<lb n="c56-0035__main__29"/>ing that <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6468__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6468__End"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6471__Start"/>reflection<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6471__End"/> all the<lb n="c56-0036__main__1"/> steps <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6483__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6483__End"/>by which I had beenprogressively led to it were <lb n="c56-0036__main__2"/> obliterated. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>andI <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6504__Start"/>saw<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6504__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>beheld only the result. What <lb n="c56-0036__main__3"/> had been the study and desire of the <lb n="c56-0036__main__4"/><del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6519__Start"/>m<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6519__End"/> wisest men since the creation of <lb n="c56-0036__main__5"/> the world was now within my <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6532__Start"/>hands.<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6532__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>grasp; Not <lb n="c56-0036__main__6"/> that, like a magic <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6546__Start"/>sceen<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6546__End"/> scene it <lb n="c56-0036__main__7"/> all opened upon me at once.on <lb n="c56-0036__main__8"/> the contraryThe <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6577__Start"/>big<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6577__End"/> information <lb n="c56-0036__main__9"/> I had obtained was <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of a nature rather one that <lb n="c56-0036__main__10"/> would<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to direct my endeavours. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that <lb n="c56-0036__main__11"/> than show me the prospect with <lb n="c56-0036__main__12"/> any precise certainty.<lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">^</metamark>so soon as I <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__2"/> should point <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__3"/> them towards <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__4"/> the object of <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__5"/> my search, <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__6"/> than to exhi<lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__7"/>bit that ob<lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__8"/>ject already <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__9"/> accomplished. I collected bones from <lb n="c56-0041__main__4"/> Charnel houses and with profane fingers <lb n="c56-0041__main__5"/> meddled with the secrets of the human <lb n="c56-0041__main__6"/> frame. In a solitary chamber–or rather <lb n="c56-0041__main__7"/> cell at the top of the house and seperated <lb n="c56-0041__main__8"/> from all other appartments by a gallery <lb n="c56-0041__main__9"/> and staircase I <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7731__Start"/>h<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7731__End"/> kept my workshop <lb n="c56-0041__main__10"/> of filthy creation; my eyeballs were <lb n="c56-0041__main__11"/> starting from their sockets in at<lb n="c56-0041__main__12"/>tending to the minutiæ of <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7745__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7745__End"/> my <lb n="c56-0041__main__13"/> employment. The dissecting room and <lb n="c56-0041__main__14"/> the slaughter house furnished many <lb n="c56-0041__main__15"/> of my materials, and often did my <lb n="c56-0041__main__16"/> human nature turn from my <lb n="c56-0041__main__17"/> occupation <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7761__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7761__End"/>whilst<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7767__Start"/>wal<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7767__End"/><del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7770__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7770__End"/> still urged <lb n="c56-0041__main__18"/> on by an eagerness which perpetually encreased, <lb n="c56-0041__main__19"/><lb n="c56-0041__left_margin__1"/>I brought my work <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7791__Start"/>drew<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7791__End"/> near <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to a conclusion.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0041__main__20"/> The <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7809__Start"/>sums<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7809__End"/> Summer months <lb n="c56-0041__main__21"/> passed while I was thus <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7816__Start"/>employed<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7816__End"/>engaged,<lb n="c56-0041__main__22"/> heart and soul, in one pursuit. It <lb n="c56-0041__main__23"/> was a most beautiful season: never <lb n="c56-0041__main__24"/> did the fields bestow a more plentiful <lb n="c56-0041__main__25"/> harvest, or the vines yeild a more <lb n="c56-0041__main__26"/> luxuriant vintage. But my eyes were <lb n="c56-0041__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7837__Start"/>hut<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7837__End"/><lb n="c56-0041__left_margin__1"/>insensible to the charms of nature & the <lb n="c56-0041__main__28"/> same feelings which <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7853__Start"/>caused<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7853__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>made me <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7864__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7864__End"/><lb n="c56-0041__main__29"/> neglect the scenes around me caused <lb n="c56-0041__main__30"/> me also to forget those friends who <lb n="c56-0041__main__31"/> were so many miles absent and whom <lb n="c56-0041__main__32"/> I had not seen for so long a time.<lb n="c56-0042__main__1"/> I knew that my silence disquieted <lb n="c56-0042__main__2"/> them and I well remembered the <lb n="c56-0042__main__3"/> words of my father. "I know that while <lb n="c56-0042__main__4"/> "you are pleased with yourself you <lb n="c56-0042__main__5"/> "will <del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7892__Start"/>thing<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7892__End"/> think of us with affection <lb n="c56-0042__main__6"/> "and we shall hear regularly from <lb n="c56-0042__main__7"/> "you. And you must pardon me <lb n="c56-0042__main__8"/> "if I regard <del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7901__Start"/>you<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7901__End"/> any interruption <lb n="c56-0042__main__9"/> "in loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7930__Start"/>opinion<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7930__End"/> would <lb n="c56-0042__main__13"/> be his feelings but I could not tear my thoughts <lb n="c56-0042__main__14"/> from my occupation loathsome in <lb n="c56-0042__main__15"/> itself but which had taken an<lb n="c56-0042__main__16"/><del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e7949__Start"/>strong<del should be<lb n="c56-0042__main__20"/> compleated.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0042__main__21"/> I then thought that my father <lb n="c56-0042__main__22"/> would be <del n="c56-0042__left_margin__1"/><metamark>X</metamark> he was in the <lb n="c56-0042__left_margin__2"/> right in conceiv<lb n="c56-0042__left_margin__3"/>ing that I <lb n="c56-0042__left_margin__4"/> should not be <lb n="c56-0042__left_margin__5"/> altogether free <lb n="c56-0042__left_margin__6"/> from blame.. A human <lb n="c56-0042__main__26"/> being in perfection ought always to <lb n="c56-0042__main__27"/> preserve a <del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8092__Start"/>cl<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8092__End"/> calm and peaceful <lb n="c56-0042__main__28"/> mind and never to allow passion<lb n="c56-0043__main__1"/> or ^a transitory desire to disturb his <lb n="c56-0043__main__2"/> tranquillity. I do not think that the pursuit <lb n="c56-0043__main__3"/> of knowledge is any exception to this rule. <lb n="c56-0043__main__4"/> If the study to which you apply yourself <lb n="c56-0043__main__5"/> has a <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8122__Start"/>d<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8122__End"/> tendency to weaken your affections <lb n="c56-0043__main__6"/> and to destroy your taste for those simple <lb n="c56-0043__main__7"/> pleasures in which no alloy can possibly <lb n="c56-0043__main__8"/> mix then that study is certainly unlawful <lb n="c56-0043__main__9"/> that <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8134__Start"/>it<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8134__End"/> is to say <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8137__Start"/>on that<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8137__End"/> not befitting <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8140__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8140__End"/> the <lb n="c56-0043__main__10"/> human mind. If this <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8145__Start"/>rul<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8145__End"/> rule <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8150__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8150__End"/>were al <lb n="c56-0043__main__11"/> ways observed; if no man allowed any <lb n="c56-0043__main__12"/> pursuit whatsoever to interfere with <lb n="c56-0043__main__13"/> his tranquillity and his domestic affections <lb n="c56-0043__main__14"/> Greece had never been enslaved, Cæsar <lb n="c56-0043__main__15"/> would have spared his country, America <lb n="c56-0043__main__16"/> would have been discovered more gradual<lb n="c56-0043__main__17"/>ly, and the Empires of Mexico & Peru had <lb n="c56-0043__main__18"/> not been destroyed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0043__main__19"/> But I forget that I am moralizing <lb n="c56-0043__main__20"/> in the most interresting part of my <lb n="c56-0043__main__21"/> tale; and your looks remind me to <lb n="c56-0043__main__22"/> proceed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0043__main__23"/> My father made no reproach in his <lb n="c56-0043__main__24"/> letters, <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8202__Start"/>an<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8202__End"/> and only took notice of my <lb n="c56-0043__main__25"/> silence by enquiring more particularly <lb n="c56-0043__main__26"/> than before what my <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8209__Start"/>co<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8209__End"/> occupations <lb n="c56-0043__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8214__Start"/>wer<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8214__End"/> were. Winter spring and summer <lb n="c56-0043__main__28"/> passed away during my labours but <lb n="c56-0043__main__29"/> I did not watch the blossom or the <lb n="c56-0043__main__30"/> expanding leaves – sights which before <lb n="c56-0043__main__31"/> had alway yeilded me supreme delight.<lb n="c56-0043__main__32"/> so <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8239__Start"/>much<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8239__End"/>deeply was I <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8248__Start"/>taken up with<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8248__End"/>engrossed in my<lb n="c56-0044__main__1"/> occupation. The leaves of that year <lb n="c56-0044__main__2"/> were withered before my work drew <lb n="c56-0044__main__3"/> near a close. And now every day shewed <lb n="c56-0044__main__4"/> me more plainly how well I had suc<lb n="c56-0044__main__5"/>ceeded. But my enthusiasm was <lb n="c56-0044__main__6"/> checked by my <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8277__Start"/>am<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8277__End"/> anxiety and I appeared <lb n="c56-0044__main__7"/> rather like one doomed by slavery <lb n="c56-0044__main__8"/> to toil in the mines or any other <lb n="c56-0044__main__9"/> unwholsome trade than an artist <lb n="c56-0044__main__10"/> occupied in his favourite employment. <lb n="c56-0044__main__11"/> Every <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8291__Start"/>nigh<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8291__End"/> night a slow fever oppressed <lb n="c56-0044__main__12"/> me and I became <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8298__Start"/>nevous<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8298__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nervous to a <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8310__Start"/>degre<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8310__End"/><lb n="c56-0044__main__13"/> most painful degree; a <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8315__Start"/>fever<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8315__End"/> a dis<lb n="c56-0044__main__14"/>ease I regretted the more because I had <lb n="c56-0044__main__15"/> hitherto enjoyed excellent health &<lb n="c56-0044__main__16"/><del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8331__Start"/>my nerves<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8331__End"/><del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8334__Start"/>were fi<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8334__End"/> had always <lb n="c56-0044__main__17"/> boasted of the firmness<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of my nerves. But I <lb n="c56-0044__main__18"/> believed that exercise and amusement <lb n="c56-0044__main__19"/> would soon <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8363__Start"/>driv<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8363__End"/> drive away <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8369__Start"/>these<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8369__End"/>suchsym<lb n="c56-0044__main__20"/><del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8379__Start"/>p<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8379__End"/>toms and I promised myself both <lb n="c56-0044__main__21"/> of these when my creation should be <lb n="c56-0044__main__22"/> complete.
